bib.title: Self-organising logic of structures as a basis for a dependency-based dynamic semantics model
bib.author: Piasecki, Maciej Tomasz and others
bib.abstract: We present Self-organising Logic of Structures (SLS), a semantic representation language of high expressive power, which was designed for a fully compositional representation of discourse anaphora following the Dynamic Semantics paradigm. The application of SLS to the description of possible meanings of Polish multiple quantifier sentences is discussed. Special attention is paid to the phenomena of: cardinality dependency/independency of Noun Phrase quantifiers and variety of quantification. Semantic representation based on
